abstract: The sale by the Swiss pharmaceutical company comes as part of an effort to focus on its larger business units.
snippet: The sale by the Swiss pharmaceutical company comes as part of an effort to focus on its larger business units.
lead_paragraph: Novartis, the Swiss pharmaceuticals group, is selling its diagnostics business to Spanish health care company Grifols S.A. for $1.7 billion in an all-cash deal.

headline.main: Novartis to Sell Diagnostics Unit to Grifols for $1.7 Billion
